import styles from './Card.module.scss' import { useState } from 'react' const Card = (props) => { const [btnPluse, setBtnPluse] = useState("/images/btn-plus.svg") const changePluse = () =>{ setBtnPluse( btnPluse = "/images/btn-checked.svg" ) } return (
{props.title}
Цена: {props.price} руб.
) } export default Card
